Today, the Causeway Coast is seeing poor conditions with 7 ft @15s WNW swell, but fresh 21 mph S winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow, expect similar poor conditions with the swell holding at 7 ft @12s WNW and winds picking up to 25 mph SW. Day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @10s WNW, but the wind increases to 28 mph SSE, keeping it messy. Best: today.
